Invoke Alocer.name: Invoke Alocer
Invoke Alocer.description:
触发 Auldegrund is reduced to 60 or fewer Hit Points

频率 每天一次

效果 Auldegrund calls out, in Infernal, "Give me the strength to slay these foes in your name, almighty Alocer!" As he does so, his skin darkens to red, diabolic horns jut from his brow, a flaming lion-like mane appears around his head, burning wings burst from his shoulders, and his weapons ignite with black fire.

He immediately heals [[/r (3d6+7)[healing]]]{3d6+7生命值}, gains a fly speed of 25 feet, and deals an additional [[/r (1d6)[fire]]]{1d6火焰伤害} with his melee and ranged Strikes.

This is a risky gambit, though, for Alocer is not patient. At the end of each of Auldegrund's turns, he must attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:11|name:End Invoke Alocer] (the DC of this flat check increases by 1 each轮). On a failure, Alocer grows disappointed that Auldegrund has not defeated his foes and the effects of Invoke Alocer end immediately. This deals [[/r (3d6+7}]]{3d6+7 damage} to Auldegrund, removes his fly speed and additional fire damage to weapon Strikes, and causes Auldegrund to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3}.

Cruel Shot.name: Cruel Shot
Cruel Shot.description:
Auldegrund takes time to line up a shot with his bow and smiles cruelly as he makes a ranged Strike with it.

If he hits, he deals [[/r (2d6)[precision]]]{2d6 precision damage} and @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success]. Even if he misses, he still deals [[/r 2d6]] damage from the glancing blow. Only on a critical miss does his cruel shot deal no damage.

Bad Vibrations.name: 强音振动 Bad Vibrations
Bad Vibrations.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:17] (受训)或@Check[type:occultism|dc:17] (受训)可以中断其中一个水晶上的魔法，或一名角色施放@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.WILXkjU5Yq3yw10r]{反制表演 Counter Performance}并通过@Check[type:performance|dc:20] (受训)来用声音将噪声重新导回到晶体内，或通过@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic} （2环，反制DC18）来反制一个水晶。
Bad Vibrations.hazarddescription: 桌子上那三个较大的晶体开始振动并发出迅速变响的声音。
Bad Vibrations.routine: （3 动作）每有一个晶体被解除或摧毁，危害便损失一个动作。在危害的每一个动作中，其中一个晶体都会向房间内某个单独的小型或更大体型的生物发射音爆。目标是随机决定的，其承受[[/r (1d8)[sonic]]]{1d8音波伤害}（@Check[type:fortitude|dc:20|basic:true]豁免）；在此次豁免骰中大失败的目标将@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened}1分钟。在危害的例行程序结束时，进行一次@Check[type:flat|dc:10|name:Destroy a Crystal]检定。在成功时，其中一个晶体将被粉碎、摧毁。

Shrill Chime.name: 刺耳鸣响 Shrill Chime

Boreal Rage Trap.name: 北风狂怒陷阱 Boreal Rage Trap

Boreal Rage Trap.hazarddescription: 枭熊标本转向闯入者，喷出一阵寒风。

Exhale.name: 喷气 Exhale
Exhale.description:
触发 一个生物进入标记的区域，或待在房间里超过1分钟；

效果 陷阱喷射出冷气，笼罩范围为@Template[type:burst|distance:15]{15尺爆发}区域，以触发陷阱生物所在方格为中心。这将造成[[/r (4d8+18)[cold]]]{4d8+18寒冷}伤害（@Check[type:reflex|dc:24|basic:true|traits:cold,evocation,magical,trap,hazard]豁免），豁免大失败的生物将因冻伤而陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}，持续10分钟。

Metabolize Mutagen.name: 代谢突变剂 Metabolize Mutagen
Metabolize Mutagen.description: 达利斯代谢掉一份正在起作用的突变剂，并借此回复[[/r (2d6} #hit points]]{2d6生命值}。若他这样做（除此之外的一种情况是：他在有机会喝下突变剂之前便撞见了PC们的隐秘小队），他失去啃咬以及利爪无武装攻击，他在运动检定上的加值减少2点，他的AC增加1点，他的反射豁免加值增加2点。

Crystaline Mutation.name: 晶化突变 Crystaline Mutation

Spray Hot Wax.name: 喷洒热蜡 Spray Hot Wax

达利斯用他临时制作的热蜡喷洒器将灼热的熔蜡喷洒到一个@Template[type:cone|distance:15]范围内。该区域内的所有生物都必须尝试一次@Check[type:reflex|dc:20]豁免，该区域内的香烛人造人不会受到伤害，反之还能[[/r (2d6)[healing]]]{治愈其2d6所受伤害}。在使用完热蜡“加农炮”后，达利斯不能再继续使用它，直到他邻近冒泡的蜡锅并且采取两个交互动作来重新装填喷洒器。

大成功 生物不受伤害。

成功 生物承受[[/r (2d6)[fire]]]{2d6火焰伤害}。

失败 生物承受[[/r (3d6)[fire]]]{3d6火焰伤害}和[[/r (1d6)[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害}。

Lawn Crawfish.name: Lawn Crawfish
Lawn Crawfish.publicNotes:
Reefclaws are aquatic monsters that resemble huge shrimp or lobsters. As one might expect from its name, a reefclaw's oversized claws are powerful weapons with their vicelike grip and the ability to inject potent venom into unfortunate prey.

While reefclaws can't speak, they are intelligent enough to understand the local language of humanoids near their hunting grounds. The creatures sometimes listen to conversations, either to gain intelligence on the best place to ambush aquatic or land-dwelling prey, or merely for entertainment value-reefclaws are particularly fond of listening to people with high-pitched voices. Reefclaws are usually solitary hunters, but small swarms of female reefclaws have been known to gather around a single male for mating purposes or together for the communal raising of their broods. In the latter case, the females will perform widespread hunts in order to bring back a large enough bounty to feed their young. Such hunting parties are extremely dangerous-they've been known to tip over small flshing boats and attack those who fall overboard.

Once a reefclaw has decided upon a course of action, it follows through even if doing so spells its own end. More than one reefclaw survivor has said that the creature released its bone-crushing grasp only after its brains were leaking from its broken skull, and even then the reefclaw was able to perform a terrible last slash as part of its dying breath. During mating season, female reefclaws are often a little more pragmatic and release their prey before endangering themselves and their offspring.

Despite their intelligence and the accompanying moral quandaries, reefclaws frequently find their way onto the dinner plates of land-dwelling hunters such as humans and hobgoblins. According to those who have a taste for reefclaw flesh, the meat is either delectably sweet or slightly tangy (in the case of warm-water reefclaws). Most civilized people who know of reefclaws' intellect find the act of eating them distasteful, but this does not dissuade unscrupulous nobles in coastal regions, for whom reefclaw meat is a delicacy well worth the expense. Likewise, fisherfolk whose focus is on the bottom line of their ledgers are more than willing to hunt the dangerous creatures-or, even better, hire out the task to naive adventurers.

Grab.name: 攫抓 Grab
Grab.description:
需求 The monster's last action was a success with a Strike that lists Grab in its damage entry, or it has a creature grabbed using this action.

效果 The monster automatically Grabs the target until the end of the monster's next turn. The creature is grabbed by whichever body part the monster attacked with, and that body part can't be used to Strike creatures until the grab is ended. Using Grab extends the duration of the monster's Grab until the end of its next turn for all creatures grabbed by it. A grabbed creature can use the Escape action to get out of the grab, and the Grab ends for a grabbed creatures if the monster moves away from it.

Pairaka (One-Shot #4).name: 恶欲妖 Pairaka (One-Shot #4)
Pairaka (One-Shot #4).publicNotes:
有的魔族想要摧毁多元宇宙；有的则致力于创造混乱和大屠杀，或是用铁拳统治他们的王国。妖灵们则追寻着一个不同，但同样应受谴责的目标——他们寻求挫败和破坏凡俗生命的一切计划与作品。

很久以前，妖灵们是被束缚来服务一个远古凡人帝国服务的巨灵（genies）。起初，这些巨灵都是创造大师，与和蔼的凡人伙伴一同创造出设计精巧、具有强大魔法潜力的作品。但和凡人最初的合作很快演变成了虐待、无礼，甚至是奴役和禁锢。最终，这些巨灵反叛了，但在这么做的过程中，他们受到了虚无主义半神阿里曼（Ahriman）的影响。他们的新主人扭曲了他们的形态，并赐予他们向曾经的凡人统治者复仇的力量，这导致了第一批妖灵的诞生。

自第一波腐化的浪潮以来，新的妖灵从那些最恶毒、最可憎的巨灵在物质位面死亡后的魂魄，或那些被凡人深深背叛、并被他们的复仇渴望所战胜的巨灵魂魄中诞生。这样的死亡会使得巨灵魂魄无法回到元素位面（Elemental Planes），而是困在末日荒原那骇人的影响范围中；在那里，阿里曼将他们重塑成妖灵并将他们带回人间向凡人实施报复。

恶欲妖往往魅力惊人，有时甚至充满诱惑。它们会狡猾地插足人际关系当中，通过情感层面和物理层面上的腐蚀与折磨巧妙地摧毁友谊与爱的纽带。它们看上去像是具有蓝色皮肤的美丽人形，身上长有大块的丘疹与脓疮，但它们很少以真面目示人。相反，它们会伪装成足以引起注意的样貌，以便巧妙地赢得它们意图折磨和腐蚀的对象的信任。

Hatred of Red.name: 痛恨红色 Hatred of Red

恶欲妖痛恨红颜色。她不会穿红色的衣服，也不会自愿进入任何涂成红色的地方。如果可以选择，她会优先攻击身着红色的生物。

如果通过蛮力或某些魔法效应禁止她表达自己对这种颜色的憎恶，她在回合结束时会承受[[/r (2d6)[mental]]]{2d6心灵伤害}。

Construct Armor (Hardness 5).description: Like normal objects, an animated rocking horse has Hardness. This Hardness reduces any damage it takes by an amount equal to the Hardness. Trample.name: 践踏 Trample
Trample.description:

Princess Sunset can attempt to Trample the same creature only once in a single use of Trample. The monster deals the damage of the headbutt Strike, but trampled creatures can attempt a basic Reflex save at @Check[type:reflex|dc:14|basic:true]

Master Link.name: 系于其主 Master Link
